Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
Come to my shop more often this year.
<PAGE>
You look good with different hair styles
so you should try a lot
and go with the style that best fits.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
I am so happy that you and
I could spend New Year's Eve together.
<PAGE>
This year I hope you'll still have
eyes only for me. Get what I mean?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year.
This year, let's have dates 
at different places.
<PAGE>
Last year I was really
busy. Maybe that's why you 
feel so bad about last year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>This year, for my dear Princess...
I don't want to cloud your face
even for a moment. That's my goal.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
"Happy New Year" or something like that.
We probably don't need to say that 
to each other though, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I don't think it's all that important.
<MYNAME>, for this year and for the years
to come we will always be together.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Obviously in this New Year
you greeted your husband first,
right?
<PAGE>
If you greeted another person I would
have to give you a little punishment.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong?  The New Year has
only just begun, and you look exhausted.
<PAGE>
Is that the way to begin the New Year?
And you say you're going to
try your best? Come on!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even though it's the New Year,
it doesn't feel like it.
<PAGE>
Just because the year's changed doesn't
mean anything important has changed.
Maybe it's a matter of mood.
NoMsg

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a noisy
count down.
<PAGE>
Ringing in the New Year 
with a bunch of other people 
doesn't sound so bad.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was a really 
cheerful countdown, huh.
<PAGE>
There were too many people! That's why
they ran out of New Year noodles. 
Must be hard for the people cooking.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>!
Happy New Year!
I wish you a wonderful year♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year!
I hope that the New Year 
is a good one, for us and our pets♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>!
I'm so glad we could spend 
New Year's Eve together, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
I'm looking forward to a new 
year with you, my dear!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year!
Let's visit some different 
places this year♪
<PAGE>
I hope that I can spend more 
time with you this year, <MYNAME>.
That is my goal for this year♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year.
I wish you another wonderful year♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Oh, but I will always be with <MYNAME>. We
will always be together. Does it sound
strange to say "another wonderful year?"
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So, then, I wish you the best?
Hmm... that's kind of strange too.
<PAGE>
This is the New Year so, "I wish you the
best this year" would be better, right?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>!
I wish you a wonderful year♪
<PAGE>
... Oh!  Am I the first one to 
receive your New Year's greeting?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hehehe,
Lucky me♪

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, what's your
goal for this year, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Eh?  Me?
Maybe... to find good owners for all the
pets at the shop. Something like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>To help pets and 
owners meet each other
is my job!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That final countdown, 3, 2, 1... 
isn't it exciting?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It's always 
a little depressing when 
a year ends, too.
<PAGE>
When a New Year
is about to begin,
one is full of hope!
NoMsg

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The count down
was very noisy and lively!
<PAGE>
I got to talk with lots of people.
It was fun♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>By this time next year, will more
people have come to the village? 
What an exciting thought!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The number of people gathered 
today was incredible.
<PAGE>
Sometimes it's nice to get 
together like that, all gathering 
around a common pot.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>This town has more 
people in it than I thought!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>.
Happy New Year.
I wish you a wonderful year.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>We have many things to do,
but let's be patient
and work at our own pace.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm so glad I was 
able to spend the New Year 
with you, my dear♪
<PAGE>
From now on, let's have 
a great year together.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year!
Let's visit some different 
places this year.
<PAGE>
I hope that I can spend 
more time with you this year, <MYNAME>.
That is my goal for this year.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, not just this year, <MYNAME>... Next
year and the years after that... What
I'm saying is, for the rest of our lives
<PAGE>
I'll do my best to ensure that 
you don't get tired of me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ah... the New Year greeting...
Am I the first one 
to be greeted by you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>No, I'm fine 
either way.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But as your husband, <MYNAME>, 
I would be delighted 
to be the first.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was so focused on my work 
every day, that this New Year 
snuck up on me before I knew it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I remember years past, 
having fun just like now,
all awaiting the New Year.
<PAGE>
Those days
will never come back again.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even in New Year, some complain that 
there isn't any improvement,
but what else can you expect?
<PAGE>
Doesn't that depend on how 
you manage your emotions?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If one were to achieve something
suns movement it wouldn't require effort
Humankind can only improve with effort
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...or something like that. I'm a little
too serious for this early in the year.
<PAGE>
Well, some years start 
out that way, I guess!
NoMsg

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The countdown was so noisy, with all
those voices. I guess that's what
you get with so many people all together
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I held my own, though, making sure I
could be heard, speaking from the belly

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The countdown in this town
was really loud.
<PAGE>
Cries of "Happy New Year" reverberated 
from the rafters. You could really feel 
the power of so many people!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I wish you and yours 
the best of health and an 
avoidance of injury this year.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I am deeply honored that I was able 
to spend the New Year with you, my dear.
<PAGE>
From now on, 
let's have a great 
year together.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year!
I hope that we are able to visit
some new places this year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>My resolution for this year is 
to ensure that you have an even 
better year than last, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
Heh, as a married couple, spending our 
lives together is normal. But this year,
saying it again sounds kind of strange.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Anyway, there is a saying which goes 
"good manners even between friends", so
the New Year's greeting is important.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ah... The New Year greeting. 
Am I the first one to receive 
this honor?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I truly hope that such 
a distinction is mine to claim.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When a New Year begins, somehow
one feels refreshed.
<PAGE>
What a strange sentiment, 
considering it is only the 
date that changes...

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The pot used for the New Year noodles...
Was it specially ordered?
I was quite impressed at its size.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You could feed this town 
no matter how many people 
came to live here!
NoMsg
NoMsg

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Festival was quite lovely, 
wasn't it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I imagine that any Festival 
would be successful with so many 
people joining together in collaboration
<PAGE>
I am so glad that Amir and I have 
come to this town, to live amongst 
its citizens.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
... What?  Huh? The New Year's greeting?
Your going around town telling everyone
"Happy New Year?!" Faithful as always.
<PAGE>
Right, right.
I hope you have a great year, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
You can come to my place if you have 
any problems with the animals.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ringing in the New Year 
with you, <MYNAME>... 
This isn't so bad.
<PAGE>
...I hope you have a nice year, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, Happy New Year.
Okay, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm going to try to 
do better this year at not hurting 
you so much with my words.
<PAGE>
I don't know if I'll be able to 
do it right away, so be patient.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, Happy New Year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What do you think this
year with bring for our life together?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>It is strange to consider
 the future.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>It has been good to meet
you this year.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have a nice year, <MYNAME>.
By the way, I doubt it, but...
<PAGE>
...you're not going to say 
that I'm the first one you've 
come to greet, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>No, it's all right.
<PAGE>
If so, coming all the way 
to your husband first shows 
how faithful you are.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...My goal for this year? Hmm.
You've put me on the spot there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Let me see...
I want to get better 
at playing the guitar.
<PAGE>
I used to be good, but I've been busy 
that I haven't had any time for it.
<PAGE>
I want to get 
back into it 
more this year.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The beginning of a New Year is something
to celebrate, there are always people
who are too cheerful on New Year's Eve.
<PAGE>
You're a bit too cheerful.
Don't neglect your job.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wasn't that pot a little too big
for that many people? 
Did they make too much?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I ate a bunch of 
servings by myself. 
My stomach has hurt since then...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Hm?  You think I shouldn't have
eaten, then? That would have been
disrespectful to the people who made it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That pot looks like 
the right size for 
so many people.
<PAGE>
Festivals have gotten 
livelier since the time 
you came, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That's a good trend, yeah? 
...I have my own work to do, 
regardless of how many people live here.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, what is it...
This place has gotten much livelier
since the time you got here, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I checked inside the huge pot, 
and it's completely empty! I can't
believe I thought there'd be leftovers.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I don't really like 
such noisy events... but I guess 
this is a pretty good atmosphere.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
Have a wonderful year.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year. I wish
you the same. Let's live this year 
without any regrets.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. I am so
fortunate to be able to ring in the 
New Year with you, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
From now on,
I hope that we have a 
wonderful year together.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year!
Let's visit some 
different places this year.
<PAGE>
I hope that I can spend more 
time with you this year, <MYNAME>.
That is my goal for this year.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Being married, spending our lives 
together is normal. But this year, 
saying it again sounds kind of strange.
<PAGE>
Anyway, there is a saying which goes 
"good manners even between friends", so
the New Year's greeting is important.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
Ah... the New Year greeting...
Am I the first one to 
be greeted by you?
<PAGE>
No, I'm fine 
either way.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But as your husband, <MYNAME>, 
I would be delighted 
to be the first.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
At this moment, in faraway towns, the
New Year is being
celebrated.
<PAGE>
People we have never meet are in
different parts of the world celebrating
the New Year like us Can you imagine?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>What a thought.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks festival that my country
holds to celebrate New Year must be good
<PAGE>
In my country, I was not in a position
I was able to join in the festivities
<PAGE>
I am overjoyed that I have the 
opportunity to celebrate so cheerfully 
with the people of this town.
NoMsg
NoMsg

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I greatly enjoyed the noise 
and excitement of the countdown.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I heard that, when you arrived in
this town, there was only about a third
of the number of people we saw tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I think it's incredible 
that this town has become 
so vigorous!
<PAGE>
It is thanks to the efforts 
of Dunhill and you, <MYNAME>. 
You must teach me your skills!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>! Happy New Year♪
Wish you a wonderful year!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>!
All right!  Let's work hard this year 
to write good articles♪
<PAGE>
The first article for the New Year
will be great. You'll see!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>!
I'm so glad I was able to ring 
in the New Year with you, <MYNAME>♪
<PAGE>
From now on, let's have a 
great year together!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year!
Let's visit different 
places this year!
<PAGE>
My goal is to spend 
more time together 
with you this year, <MYNAME>♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>!
I wish you a wonderful year♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But I will always be with you, <MYNAME>.
So is it kind of strange to say
"I wish you a great year."
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So, then, "I wish you the best?"
Hmm... that's kind of strange too.
<PAGE>
This is the New Year, so "have a
wonderful year" works fine, right?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>!
I wish you a wonderful year♪
<PAGE>
...Oh! The New Year's greeting. 
Am I the first one?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hehehe,
that sure would make me happy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was looking through the pictures 
I took last year. 
So many things happened!
<PAGE>
I hope that I have another year with
you, <MYNAME> and with the people of
this town♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The New Year noodles that Hana 
and everyone else made were delicious!
<PAGE>
Eating delicious noodles
and waiting to ring in the New Year... 
What a life!♪
NoMsg

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Counting down with everybody
was fun!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>There are quite a 
few people in this town, 
so it sure was a celebration.♪
<PAGE>
I wonder if it will get 
even bigger and noisier. 
How exciting!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There were lots of people I wanted to
thank before midnight for helping me 
with all kinds of things last year...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But there were so many people, 
and I kind of ran out of time...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But it's a good thing that 
there are so many people in this town♪
<PAGE>
They all make this 
countdown so much fun!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
Happy New Year!
<PAGE>
Let's have a 
wonderful year♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year!
I am so glad that I was able to 
ring in the New Year with you, <MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
From now on, let's have a 
great year together♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year!
Let's go to different places 
together this year.
<PAGE>
My goal for this year is to spend 
more time with you, <MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>This year, I hope that you will listen 
to all my requests♪
Hehehe <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>!
I wish you a wonderful year♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Obviously in this New Year
you came to my place
first, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...And if you didn't, I'm not going 
to speak to you for a while!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm going to think up 
a wonderful new magic trick 
this year, and surprise everyone♪
<PAGE>
Then, to show it off to everyone, 
I want to hold my own magic show.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hehehe, 
there's a lot to do♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's always so much to do at the
start of the year. Where to begin?!
<PAGE>
Every year, "one year" sounds like a
long time, but it's actually short.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>This year will go 
by in a flash, too.
<PAGE>
Soon enough, we'll all be back here, 
ringing in the New Year 
with another countdown.
NoMsg

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was quite a noisy
count down.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I didn't know what to do 
with all the people asking me 
to perform magic tricks.
<PAGE>
I guess there would be some advantages 
to showing off with so many people there
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Actually, I would have liked 
even more people to be there. 
That helps me to perform♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was a very lively
New Year's Eve♪
<PAGE>
Thinking about being able to attend 
such a fun event every year... I'm so
glad I came to live in this town<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year...
I wish you... a wonderful year...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year...
This year... more... I wish you can
come to buy many more clothes...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year... I'm so happy...
I could spend New Year's Eve...with you,
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
From now on, let's make it... 
a good year... 
together.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year...
Let's visit... 
different places together.
<PAGE>
My goal... for this year... 
is to spend more time... 
with you... <MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy New Year...
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Oh, but I will always be with <MYNAME>...
We will always be together... Is it
strange to say "have a great year..."?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So... "I wish you the best?"...
...That also sounds a little strange...
<PAGE>
This is New Year... so... "I wish you
a wonderful year" works... right?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year...
<MYNAME>...
I wish you a wonderful year...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Ah... the New Year greeting...
Am I the first one?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If so,
I would feel... delighted...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Even though the New Year has already
began...my watch is still showing...
11 o'clock... Why...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Maybe it's broken...  What a pity...
I celebrated it with everybody...
but my watch stayed in the past.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
After eating so many New Year noodles...
I'm really sleepy...
<PAGE>
I celebrated with everybody... 
I think it's time to go home...
NoMsg

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
So many people... 
at the countdown...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>That old guy, with the mustache, says he
hopes for more people in this town...
<PAGE>
I think we already have plenty... 
This still isn't enough...?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are some people like that in this
town I don't usually pay attention...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The countdown was... 
like one big voice...
<PAGE>
I really realized... 
how many people are in this town...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year.
I wish you good health and
success with your farm.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year, <MYNAME>. 
I am so fortunate to be able 
to ring in the New Year with you, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
From now on, I hope that we have 
a wonderful year together.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year!
Let's visit some 
different places this year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I hope that I can spend 
more time with you this year, <MYNAME>. 
That is one of my goals for this year.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
This is my greeting.
<MYNAME>, for this year, next year and
for all the years to come...
<PAGE>
As a married couple, we will be spending
many years together. It feels a little
weird to say "I wish you a good year."

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year,
<MYNAME>.
I wish you a wonderful year.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Oh... Um... 
the New Year greeting...
might I be the first one?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...no, it's just, 
I would be delighted 
if I were the first.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Nobody in town has a serious injury
or illness. What a wonderful way 
to ring in the New Year.
<PAGE>
I hope that everyone remains healthy 
through the New Year, too and I can say 
the same thing again this time next year

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The first time I saw that huge pot, 
I was quite surprised.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It must have been quite 
the grueling task for whoever made it!
<PAGE>
